ComicInfo.Summary: The Christmas creeps are back! While everyone else is dreaming of sugar plumbs, we're delivering a dose of holiday horror that you won't forget! This year three new tales of yuletide terror will keep you awake all Christmas night with visions of monsters and mayhem. These tales are delivered in stark black and white like the classic horror magazines of the past. Beware of creatures coming down the chimney to terrorize your family this holiday season. Come with us to discover twisted tales of holiday monsters and maniacs! Scary Christmas comes with two covers - Main & Racy Variant by the horror team of Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser (The Living Corpse)!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:03:19. [Issue ID 2545424] Additional info from indicia and publisher site.
ComicInfo.Writer: James Kuhdric,Alexander Banchitta,G. O. Parsons,S. A. Check
